channel.description: The latest CVEs for Infraware -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-7837|2024-09-17T03:08:26.838Z -- infraware -- ml%20report
item.description: An issue was discovered in ML Report Program. There is a stack-based buffer overflow in function sub_41EAF0 at MLReportDeamon.exe. The function will call vsprintf without checking the length of strings in parameters given by attacker. And it finally leads to a stack-based buffer overflow via access to crafted web page. This issue affects: Infraware ML Report 2.19.312.0000.
